title: IT Manager - Manufacturing Job at Worknigeria
content:
Worknigeria - Our client, a manufacturing and Agro company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: IT Manager - Manufacturing

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The IT Manager is responsible for directing the organisation’stechnology operations and strategy to ensure seamless business operations and sustained growth.
	This role involves overseeing IT infrastructure, managing teams, safeguarding data security, and driving technological innovation to achieve business objectives.
	The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with exceptional leadership and strategic vision.


Responsibilities
 IT Strategy and Leadership:


	Develop and execute a comprehensive IT strategy that aligns with organisationalgoals and future growth plans.
	Assess emerging technologies and recommend adoption to enhance efficiency and competitive advantage.
	Serve as a trusted advisor to senior management on IT-related matters and contribute to overall business strategy.


Infrastructure and Systems Management:


	Oversee the design, deployment, and maintenance of the organisation’sIT infrastructure, ensuring scalability, reliability, and high performance.
	Ensure optimal functioning of network systems, hardware, and software across the organisation.
	Proactively identify and address system vulnerabilities, inefficiencies, and opportunities for improvement.


Cybersecurity and Risk Management:


	Establish robust cybersecurity measures to protect organisationalassets, data, and systems from internal and external threats.
	Develop and maintain disaster recovery and business continuity plans to mitigate operational risks.
	Ensure compliance with all relevant legal, regulatory, and industry standards.


Team Development and Management:


	Lead, mentor, and manage a team of IT professionals, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and accountability.
	Define team goals, monitor performance, and support professional development initiatives.
	Manage resource allocation and workforce planning to meet project and operational demands.


Project and Vendor Management:


	Oversee the successful planning and execution of IT projects, ensuring delivery within scope, budget, and timelines.
	Collaborate with stakeholders to define project requirements and achieve alignment on objectives.
	Build and maintain relationships with vendors and service providers, negotiating contracts to secure cost-effective, high-qualitysolutions.


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	System uptime and availability metrics.
	Cybersecurity incident response time and resolution.
	Budget adherence and cost-efficiency improvements.
	Team performance and satisfaction scores.
	Timely delivery of IT projects aligned with business objectives.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred).
	Minimum of 8 years of progressive experience in IT leadership roles.
	Proven track record of successfully managing IT operations, projects, and teams.
	Experience in developing and implementing enterprise-wide IT strategies.
	Deep expertise in IT infrastructure, networks, cloud computing, and enterprise applications.
	Strategic thinking with a results-oriented approach.
	Strong knowledge of cybersecurity principles, data protection regulations, and risk management.
	Proficiency in project management methodologies and tools (e.g., Agile, PMP).
	Exceptional leadership and team management skills.
	Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making capabilities.


Salary
N700, 000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified IT Managers with experience in the Manufacturing sector should send their CV to: careers@worknigeria.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Project Manager Job at Smartcity Plc
content:
Smartcity is an investment and Infrastructure development company dedicated to creating modern real estate and infrastructural projects that allows people to live, work and relax in a technologically enabled environment that makes for pleasant and productive living.

We are recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Project Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Qualifications & Experience
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Bachelor's Degree (BSc, BEng, BTech) in Project Management or related field professional certifications ( PMP, PRINCE2, or Agile/Scrum).
	8 - 10+ years experience managing large-scale projects, preferably in real estate, infrastructure, or tech sectors.


Desirable:


	Exposure to real estate, construction, or urban development environments..
	Proficient in project tools such as Microsoft Project, Trello, Asana, ClickUp, and Excel.


Skills & Competencies:


	Leads project planning, execution, and delivery across timelines, budget, and quality metrics.
	Drives alignment between operational strategy and business objectives to ensure measurable outcomes.
	Ensures compliance with industry standards, safety regulations, and contractual obligations.
	Manages cross-functional teams, stakeholder communication, and risk mitigation initiatives.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a Cover Letter to: recruitment@smartcityplc.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
